channel.title: caret on IFF
channel.description: Recent content in caret on IFF

item.title: 广佛生活便利程度街镇分布情况——聚类模型构建（三）
item.description: 数据汇集与清洗 数据汇集 数据清洗 基本思路 建模 主成分构拟（PCA） 模型构建 最终结果 评估与结论 本文依赖的包： library(knitr) library(ggplot2) library(data.table) library(sf) library(openxlsx) library(dplyr) library(RColorBrewer) library(DescTools) library(factoextra) library(FactoMineR) library(fpc) library(dbscan) options(scipen=8) 前期数据清洗

item.title: Workflow with Caret
item.description: Foreword Structure Data Splitting Based on Outcome Based on Predictors Time Serias Data Splitting Preprocessing preProcess() Function Set Other preprocessing function Turning Numerical Recode the Categorical Variable as Numeric dummyVars() in Caret dummy_cols() in FastDummies Removing Correlated Basic Model Training Quick example Backbone of the model Subside of Model Train Resampling Options Performance Metrics Grid Search Subsampling After Trainging Quick example Variable Importance Measure Perfomance Regression Predicted Classes Class Probabilities All the packages needed in here:
